com.visualon.OSMPBasePlayer
Class voOSBasePlayer

java.lang.Object
  com.visualon.OSMPBasePlayer.voOSBasePlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.visualon.OSMPDataSource.voOSDataSource.onEventListener, com.visualon.OSMPDataSource.voOSDataSource.onRequestListener, com.visualon.OSMPEngine.voOnStreamSDK.onEventListener
public class voOSBasePlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.visualon.OSMPEngine.voOnStreamSDK.onEventListener, com.visualon.OSMPDataSource.voOSDataSource.onEventListener, com.visualon.OSMPDataSource.voOSDataSource.onRequestListener

OSMP+ BasePlayer class

Init

public int Init(android.content.Context context,
                java.lang.String packageName,
                java.util.List<voOSOption> options,
                int nPlayerType,
                int nInitParam,
                int nInitParamFlag)
Initialize PLAYER instance. This function must be called at first for a session.

Parameters:
context - Current context
packageName - Full path name of package such as /data/data/packagename/lib/
options - List of Player options. This parameter is deprecated.
nPlayerType - Type of media framework, refer to voOSType.VOOSMP_VOME2_PLAYER, voOSType.VOOSMP_OMXAL_PLAYER.
nInitParam - Initialization param, depending on nInitParamFlag,
  • if nInitParamFlag == voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_NOUSE then nInitParam should be 0;
  • if nInitParamFlag == voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_LIBOP then nInitParam should be pointer of thirdly Library OP;
nInitParamFlag - voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_NOUSE or voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_LIBOP
Returns:
voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None if succeeded

Uninit

public int Uninit()
Uninitialize PLAYER instance. This function must be called at last for a session. voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None if succeeded

SetView

public void SetView(android.view.SurfaceView sv)
Set a surface view for video

Parameters:
sv - Current SurfaceView

SetDisplaySize

public void SetDisplaySize(int width,
                           int height)
Set display dimension for video Display area is center horizontally.

Parameters:
width - display area width
height - display area height

updateVideoAspectRatio

public void updateVideoAspectRatio(int arWidth,
                                   int arHeight)
Update aspect ratio of video display

Parameters:
arWidth - width of Aspect Ratio
arHeight - height of Aspect Ratio

Open

public int Open(java.lang.Object pSource,
                int nSourceFlag,
                int nSourceType,
                int nInitParam,
                int nInitParamFlag)
Open media source

Parameters:
pSource - Source file description, should be an url or fd etc.
nSourceFlag - The flag for open source,refer to
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_URL
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_READBUFFER
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_SENDBUFFER
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_HANDLE
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_OPEN_SYNC
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_SOURCE_OPEN_ASYNC
nSourceType - Indicate the source format, usually is voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_AUTO_DETECT
nInitParam - Initialization param, depending on nInitParamFlag,
  • if nInitParamFlag == voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_NOUSE then nInitParam should be 0;
  • if nInitParamFlag == voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_LIBOP then nInitParam should be pointer of thirdly Library OP;
nInitParamFlag - voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_NOUSE or voOSType.VOOSMP_FLAG_INIT_LIBOP
Returns:
voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None if Succeeded

GetSample

public java.lang.Object GetSample(int nTrackType,
                                  int nTimeStamp)
Get sample from the source, only uese to get subtitle and ClosedCaption data.

Parameters:
nTrackType - The sample type of the stream, it will be audio/video/closed caption, refer to voOSType.VOOSMP_SOURCE_STREAMTYPE
nTimeStamp - Current time stamp
Returns:
return value depend on different nTrackType. sample of the stream, all buffer in the sample( include reserve field ) will be mantained by source, they will be available until you call GetSample again the return type is depended on the nTrackType, for voOSType.VOOSMP_SOURCE_STREAMTYPE.VOOSMP_SS_AUDIO & voOSType.VOOSMP_SOURCE_STREAMTYPE.VOOSMP_SS_VIDEO please use VOOSMP_BUFFERTYPE for voOSType.VOOSMP_SOURCE_STREAMTYPE.VOOSMP_SS_SUBTITLE please use voSubtitleInfo

GetProgramCount

public int GetProgramCount()
It retrieve how many program in the live stream For program, it should be defined as: all streams that share the same angle for video and same language for audio

Returns:
The number of the program

GetProgramInfo

public java.lang.Object GetProgramInfo(int nProgram)
Enum all the program info based on stream count

Parameters:
nProgram - The program sequence based on the program counts
Returns:
voOSProgramInfo, source will keep the info structure available until you call close

GetCurTrackInfo

public java.lang.Object GetCurTrackInfo(int nTrackType)
Get the track info we selected

Parameters:
nTrackType - [in] The sample type of the stream, it will be audio/video/closed caption, refer to voOSType.VOOSMP_SOURCE_STREAMTYPE
Returns:
voOSTrackInfo of the selected track. The trackinfo memory will be mantained in source until you call close

Parameters:
nPos - The position of seeking.
Returns:
correct position after seek operation, -1 if seek failed

Returns:
current position,-1 if fialed

SetVolume

public int SetVolume(float fLeft,
                     float fRight)
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Set playback volume

Parameters:
fLeft - Left audio channel. A value of 0.0f is silence, a value of 1.0f is no attenuation.
fRight - Right audio channel
Returns:
voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None if Succeeded
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException

GetParam

public java.lang.Object GetParam(int id)
Get the value from specified ID

Parameters:
id - type of the parameter, refer to
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_STATUS
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_SENDBUFFERFUNC
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_AUDIO_FORMAT
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_VIDEO_FORMAT
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_PLAYER_TYPE
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_AUDIO_DEC_BITRATE
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_VIDEO_DEC_BITRATE
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_CPU_INFO
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_COMMAND_STRING
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_BLUETOOTH_HANDSET
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_VIDEO_PERFORMANCE_OPTION
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_PID_SUBTITLE_SETTINGS
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_PID_BA_WORKMODE
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_PID_FUNC_READ_BUF
  • voOSType.VOOSMP_SRC_PID_COMMAND_STRING
Returns:
Depending on different id. please refer to voOSType for details. return null if failed.

GetSubtitleLanguageInfo

Get Subtitle Language Information

Returns:
Subtitle Language Information.

SelectSubtitleLanguage

public int SelectSubtitleLanguage(int nIndex)
Select Subtitle Language

Parameters:
nIndex -
Returns:
Success return voOSType.VOOSMP_ERR_None, error return error code.

GetSEITimingInfo

public java.lang.Object GetSEITimingInfo(voOSType.VOOSMP_SEI_EVENT_FLAG subID,
                                         long timeStamp)
Get SEI Timing Information

Parameters:
subID - refer to voOSType.VOOSMP_SEI_EVENT_FLAG, the type for getting SEI information, if subID is voOSType.VOOSMP_SEI_EVENT_FLAG.VOOSMP_FLAG_SEI_EVENT_PIC_TIMING, it will return voOSSEIPicTiming
timeStamp - the time stamp for getting SEI information
Returns:
if subID is voOSType.VOOSMP_SEI_EVENT_FLAG.VOOSMP_FLAG_SEI_EVENT_PIC_TIMING, SEI Timing Information object voOSSEIPicTiming, else return null.
